attributes.action: To get the petition taken down by William George On marriage
attributes.additional_details: 1611 KJV Bible I started this because I'm sick of people trying to hurt the LGBT community and it has to stop we are one county and we should all learn to get along there are more important things in the world to deal and most people are accepting the fact that love is between two people who love each other and so what if they get married
attributes.background: I don't know why people know a days are still trying to get gay marriage stopped and the do stupid things like make a petition to parliament but this needs to stop once and for all love is love and know one can stop you from loving that person you want to spend the rest of your life with.

rejection.details:
We can only remove petitions that don't comply with the petitions standards.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
